overview:
Steven Brown is president of Intergis LLC. Prior to the merger of InterGis LLC, Vericom Technologies and NovaTracker, Brown was president of Intergis LLC. He is responsible for providing corporate vision and strategic direction, as well as overseeing enterprise sales.

In 1997, Brown formed Intergis, the leading technology provider of advanced routing, scheduling, dispatching and resource tracking.
